1533632541_16LdT3GLYKemm8EWbR5BYXKMmMoZr.body: AJ and Drudge had a convo about this in 2015 and Drudge said get out of the internet ghettos i.e. Goolag, FB, and all the coordinated social platforms.  He was right.  Glad i found zeronet

1533863088_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: the most common term for being censored on fb platform is "getting zucced" but they all keep coming back day after day.  i hardly bother now because saying anything remotely interesting or thought provoking is fraught with the sword of dox hanging over everyones head.  i enjoy talking about current events but its not safe to do so in this climate.  its why i chose zeronet. tired of hysterics
